topic.title: Exercise: rapp008 - Yearly sales per region
topic.shortdesc: A report based on a parameter query and grouping.

section.p: Create a report showing the number of boxes sold in a given year per region. Upon opening the report you should be asked for which year you want to see the report. Name the report rapp008.
In the following picture you see the beginning of the output for the year 2009.
section.note: Create first a parameter query Yearly sales per region which provide the necessary data for the report and asks for the sales year.

section.title: Solution
section.p: Create a report with tab Create Report Wizard (group (Reports) . Base the report on query Yearly sales per region. Add all fields and use Region as grouping level. Customize the layout.
